title: 70 Years in NATO: Turkey's partnership with the western alliance since 1952
itunes:author: Professor Oya Dursun-Özkanca, Colonel (retired) Rich Outzen, Professor Gencer Özcan
description: Contributor(s): Professor Oya Dursun-Özkanca, Colonel (retired) Rich Outzen, Professor Gencer Özcan | The questions that will be addressed include the following: How have relations between Turkey and NATO evolved in the past 70 years? What has been the Turkish strategy toward NATO in the past two decades? How have the US and the NATO alliance approached Turkey since the early 2000s? The talk will also assess the future prospects of Turkey’s role in NATO given the changing regional circumstances in the Black Sea region.
